title: Old image falsely shared as ‘Suicide committed due to lack of facilities during the lockdown’
subtitle: The image is an old one. It is not related to any incident during the current lockdown. As per an article of ‘Nagpur Today’, the image is of an incident that took place in 2018.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
An image is being shared with the claim that, after the sudden announcement of lockdown by PM Modi, the family of a migrant worker who was walking from Surat (Gujarat) to Uttar Pradesh has committed suicide after they were exhausted on their way. ‘FACTLY’ has found the image to be old. It is not related to any recent incident during the lockdown. The image is of an incident that took place in 2018.

Did you watch our new video?
